articles.title: Judge strikes down Trump order targeting Perkins Coie law firm - NBC News
articles.description: U.S. District Judge Beryl Howell, who called the executive order an attack on the American judicial system, said Trump's directive “violates the Constitution and is thus null and void.”
articles.content: WASHINGTON A federal judge on Friday struck down President Donald Trumps executive order targeting the law firm Perkins Coie in a blistering opinion calling the presidents efforts an unprecedented at… [+2869 chars]

articles.title: Pope Francis’ cardinal picks bring new voices to the conclave - Catholic News Agency
articles.description: The proportion of cardinal electors from Africa and the Middle East, Asia and the Pacific, Latin America, and countries in Europe has grown since the 2013 conclave.
articles.content:
